statements: DELETE FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 201 AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM fraud_history WHERE fraud_type = 'Account Takeover'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND first_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM account_balance WHERE customer_id = 3 AND balance < 0
